channel.title: CVE Feed for GNOME -- Gdk-Pixbuf
channel.description: The latest CVEs for GNOME -- Gdk-Pixbuf

item.title: CVE-2017-2870|2024-09-16T17:48:57.369Z -- gnome -- gdk-pixbuf
item.description: An exploitable integer overflow vulnerability exists in the tiff_image_parse functionality of Gdk-Pixbuf 2.36.6 when compiled with Clang. A specially crafted tiff file can cause a heap-overflow resulting in remote code execution. An attacker can send a file or a URL to trigger this vulnerability.
